title: Albuquerque
body: It is a noble and ancient family surname on this island. It comes from D. Sebastiana de Albuquerque, who married Jacinto de Freitas, from the Freitas da Madalena house, around the year 1570. This D. Sebastiana descends from D. Afonso Teles de Meneses, the founder of the town of Albuquerque in Spain.

1570: Year of marriage with Jacinto de Freitas
